line_1: "That things might be, through Captain A,
line_2: "Just brought about in their own way! "

line_1: Nor call his lordship —, her grace a —:
line_2: Deep let her wound, not rankle to a sore,

line_1: Unless they're each a QUEEN — a,
Tho' no great scholar, knew your Greek A,
line_2: Alpha, and so forth, to Omega;
